ï»¿STAI UTORY COMMITTEE REPORT TO: The President, Internatio tal Bank for Reconstruction and Development Report of the Committee under Section 4 (iii) of Article III of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Loan (Horticulture Development Project) to the Republic of Uzbekistan The undersigned Commi tee constituted under Section 7 of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International 3ank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) hereby submits its report pursuant to S.-ction 4 (iii) of Article III of said Articles in respect of the proposal that the Bank grant to th - Republic of Uzbekistan (the Borrower) a loan in an amount of one hundred fifty million United States Dollars ($150,000,000). The purpose of said loan is to enhance the productivity and prof itability of the horticulture sector in the Project Area. 1. The Committee has caref ally studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a loan, and of the purpose to which the proce .ds of the loan are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of th. opinion that the Project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such loan are to be ipplied comes within the purposes of the Bank as set forth in Article I of said Articles of A greement, and that said Project is designed to promote the development of the productive facilities and resources of the Borrower and is in the interest of the Borrower and of the members of 1 he Bank as a whole.
ï»¿-2- REPUBLIC OF UZBEKISTAN (Horticulture Development Project) 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Bank, and hereby recommends said Project for such assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Expert Selected by Governor for Republic of Uzbekistan Regional Vice President Europe and Central Asia Region Dated at Washington, D.C.
